1.content: What was you Job in the Vault?
1.title: Who are/were You?

info.brief_description: You are a Vault Dweller having to leave the vault to explore and establish the Wasteland.
info.description:
It is currently year 2222 and you are/were a resident of Vault 73 and now must leave your Vault. You will encounter many different people, places, creatures, and experiences.

Vault 73 is located a few miles outside the edge of Kansas City, somewhere along the Kansas-Missouri border. The area wasn't directly hit by nuclear bombs, but two landed east of the area and one landed west of the area. Luckily, you were a control vault, you think. Nothing too life changing if there was an experiment.

Please do not reuse material that appears in other fallout games, however I will leave a list of factions that are allowed to exist in this area. I strongly urge that you make you own.

Allowed Canon Factions:
1. Brotherhood of Steel (Must be a Branch)
2. Raiders (Common)
3. Enclave (Must be a Branch)

Also, try to keep everything lore friendly.
